conversations.body_text: Hi Guy Moulton,  Here is the latest tracking information. Please have a look.
Hi Guy Moulton,    You can use this link to track it, it has now gone through customs and is expected to arrive for you around the 5th.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXG1914765108YQ

this link does not work

On Tue, Oct 28, 2025, 3:40 PM service@simsonn.com
ID 号为 531, 1129 和 5373 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单531  
      主题: Order #SSN1582  
      描述:  
   
 Good morning, 
   
 I ordered this over 2 weeks ago, it was supposed to ship Monday. The order status reads Confirmed. When is it going to ship and when can I expect delivery? 
  

  
 
 
Guy Moulton Warehouse Manager, Tampa Direct: 813-392-3550 Mobile: 813-406-1577  Charlotte Warehouse 1921 Freedom Drive Charlotte, NC 28208 Atlanta Warehouse 3170 Reps Miller Rd, Suite 100, Norcross GA 30071  Tampa Warehouse 207 Kelsey Lane Suite A, Tampa, FL 33619 PreferredFloorandTile.com

合并来自工单1129  
      主题: Order #SSN1582  
      描述:  
 Order #SSN1582 
   
 This order has been in a shipping status for a very long time. Last week it stopped tracking at the destination country, passed customs and now it says the tracking number you submitted was unable to track. 
   
 Do you have an update and an ETA? 
   
  

  
 
 
Guy Moulton Warehouse Manager, Tampa Direct: 813-392-3550 Mobile: 813-406-1577  Charlotte Warehouse 1921 Freedom Drive Charlotte, NC 28208 Atlanta Warehouse 3170 Reps Miller Rd, Suite 100, Norcross GA 30071  Tampa Warehouse 207 Kelsey Lane Suite A, Tampa, FL 33619 PreferredFloorandTile.com

合并来自工单5373  
      主题: Problem with delivery of order  
      描述:  
 order# SSN2833 
   
   
 This has had no update for an extended time. There is a problem with the order and I need an update ASAP. I just received the order I made a few WEEKS AFTER this order was placed. If the order is delayed any more I will need to cancel the order and buy the product from AliExpress as they will have it here to me in a week. Please answer immediately this is my second email and I've had no answer 
  

  
  
Guy Moulton Warehouse Manager, Tampa 
Corporate: 704-522-0404  Mobile: 813-406-1577  North Carolina, South Carolina, Georgia, Florida, Tennessee, Minnesota, Arizona, Texas

Hi Guy Moulton,  Did you mean the link doesn’t work? Could you please send it to me so I can check? Thank you.

Hi Guy Moulton,    We sincerely apologize for the delay. We have contacted the logistics provider to investigate and will update you as soon as we have more information.  We have already sent a message to https://www.too.express/ on your behalf. You should receive a response from them shortly. Here is your tracking number: TEP00084293080
